properties.sfomuseum:description: Newspaper clipping from the San Francisco Chronicle, dated October 10, 1929, titled “Gas tax ample for highways, declares Meek / Bay shore should be kept clear, state director tells down towners,” concerning funding for highway construction with existing source of revenue.
